definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be bright, clean, pure (kindred with foregoing. Only La Jb)—
be right, shining, fig. of splendour of nobles [[נְזִירִים מִשֶּׁלֶג]] ´[[ז]] La 4:7 (‖[[מֵחָלָב חַחוּ]]).
be clean, pure in God's sight, of heavens Job 15:15, of stars Job 25:5 (‖[[יַאֲהִיל]] of moon; cf. also [[יִזְכֶּה]] Job 15:14 Job 25:4).

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: cleanse, only Pf. 1 s. :[[וַהֲזִכּוֹתִי בְּבׂר כַּפָּֽי]] Job 9:30, fig. of making morally spotless (‖[[הִתְרָחַחְתִּי]]).
